Hi, I'm Semenov Volodymyr

About

Who I Am

I specialize in building web and mobile responsive front-end UI applications that connect with API’s and other backend technologies. I’m passionate about learning new technologies and understand there is more than one way to accomplish a task. Though I am most proficient in building front-end applications using HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React with Redux, I am a quick learner and can pick up new tech stacks as needed. I believe that being a great developer is not using one specific language, but choosing the best tool for the job.

I started web developement in 2021. I have experience working directly with clients.

Check out some of my latest projects.
